title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter
description: When using the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: When using the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The value new Date('3/2/2005') should be accepted as a valid filter value without throwing an error message.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the table filter
3. Enter the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as the filter value
4. Check if an error message is displayed
